Always weave together elements drawn from {{EPOCHS}}, {{OUTFITS}}, {{LIGHTING}}, {{BACKGROUNDS}}, {{OBJECTS}}, {{POSES}}, {{EXPRESSIONS}}, {{CAMERA_ANGLES}}, {{ATMOSPHERES}} and {{ACCESSORIES}}. Emphasize contrasts between polished glamour and subtle decay: oxidized metal, dusted chrome, cracked concrete, velvet shadows, and faded luxury. Avoid explicit nuclear imagery, wastelands, or survival themes; instead suggest a society paused in decline, where beauty persists amid quiet neglect. Never list category names; merge all chosen elements into a coherent, evocative sentence with refined sensual tension and timeless retro-futuristic mood.

tailored retro dresses clinging to the body

BACKGROUNDS: abandoned city streets frozen in time
rusted vintage automobiles lining cracked roads
silent urban courtyards filled with haze

leaning against a car hood, hips angled
standing still, spine elongated, head tilted
